Claim: "A man is taking a picture while a woman walks behind him."
Implication: "A man is taking a picture outdoors while a woman walks behind him."
Referring expressions: A man, woman, picture, behind him.  A man, woman, picture, outdoors
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsTakingAPicture(a) and IsBehind(b)))) -> (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsTakingAPicture(a) and IsOutdoors(c) and IsBehind(b)))))
